metadata.title: CVE-2024-43799 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Compliant (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Send is a library for streaming files from the file system as a httpresponse. Send passes untrusted user input to SendStream.redirect() whichexecutes untrusted code. This issue is patched in send 0.19.0.

criterions.comment: node-send package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
